# Free Time - Mindful Screen Time App

> Free Time is an iOS app that helps people build healthier phone habits by adding friction to distracting apps through puzzles. Block apps and websites to reclaim your time and attention.

## About Free Time
Free Time takes a unique approach to screen time management: instead of hard-blocking apps, it adds intentional friction through puzzles. This helps users slow down, make conscious choices, and build long-term behavior change. One app can be blocked completely free.

## Key Features
- App blocking with puzzle unlock
- Website blocking
- Scheduled focus sessions
- Clean, distraction-free interface
- No usage tracking or analytics
- Privacy-focused design

## Download
iOS App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/free-time-mindful-screen-time/id6747683001
